title: AI Intern
description: I worked on a project that uses computer vision to determine which gun a bullet was shot from. This is useful for crime scenes involving firearms and was even presented at the International Criminology Hybrid Conference.

title: SDE Intern
description: I worked under the Shopping Quality team, which is an engineering team that explores Amazon products. For my project, I developed a feature to enable parsing images within an internal platform called Harmonia.

title: SDE Intern
description: I worked under the SuperFresh team, which is an up-to-date LLM data provider to Rufus. For my project, I developed two features in an internal Amazon platform called Wedge to simplify evidence insertion into an index.

title: VP
description: M||E is Emory University's competitive programming and technical interview club. As Vice President, my responsibilities have been assisting with funding, designing the flier, and delivering lectures on topics like BFS and recursion.
